favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.drag: Drag and drop to rearrange favorites
favorites.empty: Add favorites by clicking the star icon from the actions in the Use Turns category

general.flavorText: For each turn you spend {flavor}, your empire produces 25% more {item}.

explore.title: Explore
explore.flavorText: For each turn you spend {flavor}, your empire will grow by {explore} {item}.

heal.title: Heal
heal.flavorText: Using turns in any way will heal your empire but for each turn you spend {flavor}, your empire will heal an additional percentage point. Your resource production will be reduced to 66% of its baseline value.

cash.title: Cash
cash.warning: A high tax rate will lower your max health.

industry.title: Industry
industry.update: Input the percentage of production to dedicate to each type of unit.
